name: Color Blocks (itch)
description:
The goal of the game is to pass all the stages using the actions
of each block color in your favor.
Choose the right time to jump or it will not be possible
pass phase, each leap costs you a blue heart, without them
it is not possible to jump and to unlock the next phase is
nescessário finish the current phase with at least 2 hearts
blue.
Some blocks can make you jump automatically without losing
blue hearts, and others make you lose red hearts and
without them you die.
Blocks can change gravity and more.

Find out for yourself.

GOOD GAME!!!
